message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACE_HAS_END_DATE_CANNOT_BE_USED_FOR_PLACEMENT_WITHOUT_END_DATE
message.locale: This place has an End Date, %1d, it cannot be used for a placement without a To date.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_CASE_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Case Reference Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_CLIENT_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Client Reference Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: From Date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_CASE_PARTICIPANT_ROLE_ID_IS_INVALID
message.locale: The Case Participant Role ID is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_CLIENT_REFERENCE_NUMBER_IS_INVALID
message.locale: The Client Reference Number is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_CLIENT_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: The client, %1s, is not an 'Active' case participant, the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PARTICIPANT_END_DATE
message.locale: The client, %1s, is not a case participant for the placement period, the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_MUST_BE_ACTIVE
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not 'Active', the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not valid for the placement period specified, the placement cannot be created. The service period(s) are as follows: %2s.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_STATUS_MUST_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: The provider service, %1s, is not 'Approved', the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PROVIDER_OFFERING_NOT_VALID_FOR_PERIOD_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, for the placement period specified, the placement cannot be created. The provider service period(s) are as follows: %3s.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PROVIDER_DOES_NOT_PROVIDE_THIS_SERVICE
message.locale: The provider, %1s, does not provide this service, %2s, the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PROVIDER_STATUS_MUST_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: The provider, %1s, is not 'Approved', the placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_RV_PLACEMENT_ALREADY_ENDED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This placement has already ended, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_EARLIEST_SERVICE_DATE_FROM_OF_ANY_SERVICE_INVOICE_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: The From date, %1d, must be on or before the earliest Service Date From of service invoice line item, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACEMENT_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_TODAY
message.locale: The placement From date, %1z, must be on or before today.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACEMENT_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The placement To date, %1z, must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_EMERGENCY_PLACE_NOT_ACTIVE_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_TRANSFERRED
message.locale: This emergency place is not 'Active', the placement cannot be transferred.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_SEARCH_CRITERIA_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Search Criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XFV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED_ONLY_IF_FROM_DATE_ENTERED
message.locale: The To date must be entered only if From date is entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XFV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The To date, %1d, must be on or after the From date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The From date time,%1z, must be on or after current date time.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_RV_PLACEMENT_ALREADY_ENDED_CANNOT_BE_TRANSFERRED
message.locale: This placement has already ended, it cannot be transferred.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_COMPARTMENT_NOT_ACTIVE_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_TRANSFFERED_HERE
message.locale: This compartment, %1s, is not 'Active', the client cannot be transferred here.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACE_ENDS_ON_CLIENT_CANNOT_BE_TRANSFFERED_HERE
message.locale: This place, %1s, ends on, %2d, the client cannot be transferred here.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_TRANSFER_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_CURRENT_PLACEMNET_FROM_DATE
message.locale: The From date of transfer, %1z, must be on or after the current placement From date, %2z.

message.name: PLACEMENT_MODIFICATION_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Placement Modification Notification.

message.name: PLACEMENT_MODIFICATION_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: The Placement of Place, %1s, has been modified.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_NO_PLACEMENT_EXISTS_FOR_THE_PLACE
message.locale: No placement exists in the place.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_NO_PLACEMENT_EXISTS_FOR_THE_SELECTED_PLACE
message.locale: No placement exists in the place, %1s.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_SERVICEOFFERING_ID_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Service ID' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_SERVICEOFFERING_ID_IS_INVALID
message.locale: 'Service ID' is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PROVIDER_ID_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Provider ID' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PROVIDER_ID_IS_INVALID
message.locale: 'Provider ID' is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACE_ID_IS_INVALID
message.locale: 'Place ID' is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACE_ID_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Place ID' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACEMENT_ID_IS_MANDATORY
message.locale: 'Placement ID' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACEMENT_ID_IS_INVALID
message.locale: 'Placement ID' is invalid.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACE_NOT_AVAILABLE_PLACEMENT_CANOT_BE_DONE
message.locale: This Place is not available for the placement period specified. Placement cannot be done.

message.name: ERR_TRANSFER_CASE_XRV_PLACEMENT_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_BEFORE_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The placement must be 'Active' and the From date, %1z, must be before today.

message.name: ERR_TRANSFER_CASE_XRV_PLACEMENT_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_CURRENT_DATE
message.locale: The placement must be 'Active' and the To date, %1z, must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FROMDATE_EARLIER_THAN_CURRENT_PLACEMENT_TODATE
message.locale: From date,%1z, must be before the To date of the current placement,%2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_TODATE_EARLIER_THAN_PLACEMENT_FROMDATE
message.locale: The From date,%1z must be on or before the To date,%2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACEMENT_CANNOT_BE_ADDED_FOR_PARTICIPANTTYPE_NOT_PERSON
message.locale: The placement can be created only for a participant type of '%1c'.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_PLACEMENT_FREQUENCY_CANNOT_BE_CHANGED
message.locale: The placement payment frequency cannot be altered as payments have been processed till '%1d'.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_CLIENT_ALREADY_PLACED_FOR_OVERLAPPING_PERIOD
message.locale: This client is already placed with provider, %1s, for service, %2s, from %3z to %4z, the placement cannot be done.

message.name: EMERGENCY_PLACE_NAME
message.locale: EmergencyPlace

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_TRANSFER_PLACEMENT_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The placement must be 'Active' and the To date, %1z, must be on or after today.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_AS_SALI_IS_IN_COMPLETE_OR_INPROGESS_STATE
message.locale: A related service authorization line item for placement is in %1c state, placement cannot be deleted.
A related service authorisation line item for placement is in %1c state, placement cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_CANNOT_BE_DELETED_AS_IT_IS_IN_PAST
message.locale: The placement is for a past period, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: PLACEMENT_DELETION_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Placement Deletion Notification.

message.name: PLACEMENT_DELETION_NOTIFICATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: The Placement has been deleted.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_RV_PLACEMENT_ALREADY_DELETED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: This placement is 'Canceled', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACEMENT_STATUS_CANCELED
message.locale: The placement is '%1c', it cannot be transferred.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_PLACEMENT_TODATETIME_AFTER_CURRENTDATETIME
message.locale: The placement To date, %1z, must be on or after the current date and time.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_EXISTS_PLACECEMENT_CANNOT_BE_CREATED
message.locale: There is an 'Active' reservation on this place for the period, %1d - %2d, placement cannot be created.

message.name: ERR_PLACE_XRV_ACTIVE_RESERVATION_EXISTS_PLACECEMENT_PERIOD_CANNOT_BE_UPDATED
message.locale: There is an 'Active' reservation on this place for the period, %1d - %2d, placement period cannot be updated.

message.name: TEXT_PLACEMENT_TRANSFER_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE
message.locale: This will create a reservation for %1s starting from %2z

message.name: ERR_TRANSFER_XRV_PLACEMENT_FROMDATE_AFTER_PLACEMENT_TODATETIME
message.locale: From date, %1z, must be on or before the To date of the current placement, %2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_TRANSFER_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_CURRENT_PLACEMNET_FROM_DATE
message.locale: From date of transfer, %1z, must be after the current placement From date, %2z.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_FV_SERVICEOFFERING_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Service must be selected.

message.name: ERR_PLACEMENT_XRV_NON_PLACEMENT_SERVICE
message.locale: The service, %1s, is a non-placement service, placement cannot be created.
